title: Instructional Design Scenario for Enhancing Mind-Map Visual Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts in science and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners perform tasks requiring visual analysis and integration of complex scientific information, with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can understand the radial structure of mind maps and systematically explore concepts from main ideas to sub-concepts.
Learners enhance information integration skills by leveraging the complementary relationship between text and mind maps.
Learners can diagnose their visual reading patterns and develop improvement strategies through eye-tracking data analysis.

resources: Integrated Text/Mind-Map Learning Materials for Science

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
